H0.text: Where is the venue for the next Winter Olympics in 2010. Whistler

H1.text: Where is the venue for the next Winter Olympics in 2010. Salt Lake City

H2.text: Where is the venue for the next Winter Olympics in 2010. Innsbruck

H3.text: Where is the venue for the next Winter Olympics in 2010. Vancouvr

A4.text: Whistler was the Host Mountain Resort of the Vancouver 2010 Winter Olympics and Paralympic Games, the first time the International Olympic Committee has bestowed that designation on a community.

A5.text: During the 2010 Winter Olympics, Whistler hosted most of the alpine, Nordic, luge, skeleton, and bobsled events.
